Posts.Content: Hi, I had a double mastectomy last June with some Lymph Nodes out, then a full Node Clearance and implants in January. I can honestly say my boobs look better than they did before!!!! The drains are the worst aspect of the operations as I found it hard to sleep on my back and I kept snagging the drain lines chasing children around! It's not pleasant but you will come through the other side like I did xxxx
Posts.Title: Mastectomy on wednesday..any advice/tips?
